\w He|strong="H1696"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w moreover|strong="H1696"\w*, \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* somewhat \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w thee|strong="H1696"\w*. \w And|strong="H1697"\w* she \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, \w Say|strong="H1696"\w* \w on|strong="H1696"\w*.
